sentences.en: For months I had been either unwilling or unable to go through with it.
sentences.cn: 数月来，我一直不是不愿意就是没办法做这件事。

sentences.en: He is unwilling to give up the opportunity.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意放弃这个机会.

sentences.en: He was unwilling or unable to pay the fine.
sentences.cn: 他是不愿意付这罚款，不然就是付不起。

sentences.en: He was unwilling to make a prediction about which books would sell in the coming year.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意预测来年哪些书会有销路。

sentences.en: His tightfisted employer was unwilling to give him a raise.
sentences.cn: 他那吝啬的雇主不肯给他加薪.

sentences.en: I was an unwilling witness of their quarrel.
sentences.cn: 我不愿做他们吵架的见证人.

sentences.en: Men are anxious to improve their circumstances, but are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.--James Allen
sentences.cn: 人们总是渴望改善周遭环境，但是却不愿意改善自己，因此总停留在原地，无法进步。

sentences.en: She is tough, unwilling to take no for an answer.
sentences.cn: 她很强硬，不达目的誓不罢休。

sentences.en: She was certainly an unwilling victim of circumstances.
sentences.cn: 她成为情势的牺牲品绝对不是自己愿意的。

sentences.en: She whipped her hand away, unwilling to let him touch it.
sentences.cn: 她急速地把手抽开, 不愿让他碰.

sentences.en: Some people are unwilling to attend the classes partly because of the cost involved.
sentences.cn: 有些人不愿来上课，部分原因是所需的费用问题。

sentences.en: The illness made her apathetic and unwilling to meet people.
sentences.cn: 疾病使她冷漠，不愿见人。

sentences.en: The management is understood to be very unwilling to agree to this request.
sentences.cn: 据了解，管理层很不乐意答应这项要求。

sentences.en: The natives were unwilling to be bent by colonial power.
sentences.cn: 土著居民不愿受殖民势力的摆布.

sentences.en: They are unwilling to invest any more money in the project.
sentences.cn: 他们不想在这个项目上再增加投资。

sentences.en: They were unwilling, or unable, to guarantee safe passage from the city to the aircraft.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿意或者不能够保证从市内到飞机场的安全通行。

sentences.en: 英文例句: He was unwilling or unable to pay the fine.
sentences.cn: 他是不愿意付这罚款，不然就是付不起。

trans.tran_cn: 不愿意的，不情愿的，勉强的，厌恶的，不甘
trans.tran_en: not wanting to do something and refusing to do it
